EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Unified NORAM Invite 5-10-17
EmailTemplate.subject: VIP Invitation - Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Pivotal partners with its clients to enable their digital transformation through technology, agile development, and analytics. We work side-by-side, modeling and deploying successful analytics strategies. Join us for the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow, where you will learn how to develop and implement these proven strategies through innovative initiatives and guided, hands-on exercises.
Register Now <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=noram-unified-pair_q2-317]]> to attend this complimentary, day-long event in one of the following cities:
Chicago - May 23 Los Angeles - June 7 New York - June 14 Minneapolis - July 18 Seattle - July 26 Detroit - August 1 Dallas - August 8 Atlanta - August 15 <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=noram-unified-pair_q2-317]]>
The morning session will cover: - Steps to develop and implement your analytics strategy and roadmap - Best practices for risk and fraud management, cyber security and IoT - Migrating new projects and legacy production data warehouses to the cloud
The afternoon hands-on workshop will cover: - Analytics Best Practices exercise guided by a Pivotal data science expert - Key analytical models, from machine learning to geospatial and graph
The event is designed for: - Business leaders and marketers who leverage data to compete and win - Enterprise architects, IT, data warehousing, and BI professionals - Data scientists, business analysts, statisticians, data engineers, and hackers
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=noram-unified-pair_q2-317]]>
If you have any questions, please email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Thank you in advance for joining us, The Pivotal Team
